label: RequestingParty
comment: An individual, a group, or a body having a role as a requestor.

datatypeProperties.comment: The code specifying the access rights, such as unlimited, restricted, prohibited, for this requesting party.
The Business Entity Identifier (BEI) as defined by ISO 9362 (Banking telecommunication messages, Bank Identifier Codes) for this financial identity.
A code specifying a language for this requesting party.
A code specifying the type of TT party.

objectProperties.comment: The financing financial account, used for managing the line of credit, specified for this financing summary document.
A creditor financial account specified for this trade settlement payment means.
Proprietary information which uniquely identifies a person or organization.

referencedBy.comment: The requesting party specified in this financing request document.
